backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, vehicles, notifications, invite codes, permissions, and activation tokens with various helper checks and admin/user operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup list providing brief summaries of numerous frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hooks rules with custom warnings and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier configuration defining formatting rules such as print width, semicolons, and quote style.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Policy outlining protected interfaces, backend API stability rules, and mandatory review and verification steps.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Changelog documenting release history, fixes, changes, and technical notes for versions 1.0.0 and 1.0.1.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Runs frontend quality checks by invoking the npm gates script.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for app styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting PWA metadata, icons, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist requiring validation of behavior, routes, backend API, state impact, quality gates, and documentation.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching strategy, asset fetching rules, and cache versioning.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing quality gate requirements and how to run automated checks.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining usage of the project's change-control system for stable feature development.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation describing semantic versioning rules used in the project.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file intended for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, routing, and service worker registration for the app.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card enabling users to view activation status and redeem activation tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Shows an inline profile load error with retry options and technical details.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Internet Identity sign‑in screen with branding, feature highlights, and login button state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Displays backend startup error diagnostics with retry modes, health checks, and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the Pasar Digital Community logo with configurable size classes.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file for a language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, footer, routing, install banner, and degraded backend connection banner support.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned, disabling actions when backend is degraded.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for reporting a found vehicle with validation and backend degradation gating.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with user menu, admin detection, mobile menu, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBa: Shows a dismissible PWA install banner when install is available and triggers the browser install prompt.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Displays a dismissible banner showing backend connection errors with retry, status, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches unexpected top-level errors and renders a fallback UI.
Fullscreen fallback card explaining a critical app error with steps and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Form to initiate a vehicle transfer, blocked when backend is degraded, and shows generated transfer code on success.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Dialog prompting for PIN input, disabling submission when backend is degraded and supporting pending states.
frontend/src/components/vehicle/VehicleP: Renders a vehicle photo with error fallback if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap status with retry logic, including continuous retries for service-unavailable states and backend health integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations such as checking admin status, onboarding eligibility, invite codes, activation tokens, and system stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Combines actor bootstrap and health checks to derive backend availability and status messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Performs periodic anonymous backend health checks and exposes reachability and diagnostic info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, login flow, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations for marking vehicles lost/stolen/pawned or reporting them found.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Retrieves user notifications and marks notifications as read with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles onboarding completion with logging, error normalization, and related cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Queries and updates the user PIN, including setup and change operations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile, tied to identity and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfer.ts: Initiates and accepts vehicle transfers and refreshes relevant vehicle queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Duplicate transfer hooks for initiating and accepting vehicle transfers with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Mutation for backend vehicle status checks using engine number.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Checks vehicle‑registration activation status and redeems activation tokens with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: React Query hooks for fetching user vehicles, individual vehicles, registering a vehicle, and revoking ownership with cache updates.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for i18n provider.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty Simplified Chinese translation file placeholder.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Empty test file placeholder for VehiclesPage fetch-flow tests.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page describing the app, features, and admin contact info with UI cards and branding.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Page for accepting vehicle transfers with backend degradation checks, form submission, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin-only dashboard showing system stats, access validation, and error handling for admin and stats queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page for generating activation tokens, validating principals, and copying tokens or instructions, with admin-access checks and UI states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing vehicle stats, notifications, reported vehicles count, and quick action shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Page listing lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with search, status badges, and reporting dialog.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays a list of user notifications and allows marking them as read, with loading and empty states.
Empty page placeholder for onboarding via invite.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: User onboarding form that collects profile data and optionally sets up the first admin account.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page with backend gating, editable user info, and PIN setup/update dialog.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form for registering a vehicle with photo upload, activation checks, and backend availability gating.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundVehiclePag: Searches vehicles by engine number and allows reporting found vehicles when eligible based on status.
frontend/src/pages/RevokeOwnershipPage.t: Lists owned vehicles and enables revoking ownership with PIN confirmation, handling loading and error states.
Page for creating or updating a security PIN with validation and backend availability checks.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Engine-number lookup page that displays vehicle status, badges, errors, and found-vehicle reporting options.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed vehicle info, ownership actions, status badges, and PIN-gated revoke functionality.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists user's vehicles with status badges, error/loading states, and vehicle registration access handling.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers and manages the service worker in production, handling updates, skip-waiting, and controlled page reloads.
frontend/src/pwa/usePwaInstallPrompt.ts: React hook that manages PWA install prompts, dismissal timing, and installability detection based on browser events.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Root routing guard handling authentication, profile onboarding redirects, and bootstrap error or loading states before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a safe actor proxy that wraps access-control initialization, handling invalid admin tokens without breaking startup.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a canonical React Query key for actor-related queries based on identity.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines allowlisted admin principals and provides helpers to check and retrieve them.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, extracts technical details, detects canister-stopped conditions, and provides user-facing guidance messages.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor call errors into user-facing messages with context-specific handling and optional technical details.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty utility file placeholder for onboarding troubleshooting logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app’s version and build timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS themes, colors, plugins, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, features, and tasks related to vehicle registration and ownership workflows.
